column4: I'm on Ubuntu 9.04. I'm having a problem where everytime i click on a specific column in the places menu it plays dvd's instead of opens folders. I have been trying to get help with this in THIS channel for almost a week and it's still not resolved. I refuse to talk to anyone who is not in the US Navy or Retired from the US Navy
if you remove the army bit from it people might help
why do they have to be from the navy?
do navy folks know more about ubuntu than anyone else or something?
